name: Run Santa Run! - Santa Clauses Running For Gifts
name_original: Run Santa Run! - Santa Clauses Running For Gifts
description:
Santa Clause lost all the christmas gifts and have to collect them all. But he's in luck - the angels gift bag was to full and a lot of the gifts fall on the street or are in the air. Collect all the gifts to make the kids around the world happy.

Don't touch the vehicles if they drive your way or you'll lose.

As you progress through the game, it will become harder to keep up... improve your skills and master all the obstacles and collect as many gifts as you can.

This is a game for the whole family and brings you a lot of fun and entertainment.

Features:
-Easy to learn - only jump and run
-Progressively harder gameplay
-Very cute graphics
-Cool sounds and music
-Save and load automatically your progress
